Panzer::

She heard Galvatron's message and thought about it. If she did have 
an unknown trump card, best to save it untill the last minute.  She 
watched then carry her into the lava doorway.  She moved her head so 
she could see who was talking. She looked at Shiva, but didn't 
speak.  Something about this whole thing nagged at her logic 
circuits. Why wold preds kidnap a maximal, she thought. She wanted to 
know the answer.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Luzbel/Attilla::
> 
> Lava that was around of BlackFortress go down, and the slidder door

> with the femme gripped, did the same. The door closed and  the lava 
> lake increased it's levels again, soon athe fortress would be  
> covered by the lava once more time.
> 
> Luzbel and Attilla looked that Shivah was waitting them and Shivah 
> said "Well, who are with your brothers? who's the new guest of 
> BlackFortress?"
